resetPasswordMessage: Now, you can reset your password...
verifyOtpMessage: Please enter the OTP sent to your inbox.
recoverPasswordMessage: Enter the email address associated with your Wkeel account.
upperCaseError: The password must contain at least one upper case letter.
lowerCaseError: The password must contain at least one lower case letter.
digitError: The password must contain at least one digit.
specialCharError: The password must contain at least one special character.
passwordLengthError: The password must be more than 8 characters.
invalidEmailError: The value is not a valid email address.
